definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: There will be a sale of impounds by the police department next week.
sentences.chinese: 下週有個警方罰沒物品的特賣會。

sentences.english: Shoppers flocked to the sale at the new mall.
sentences.chinese: 大批顧客湧進新購物商場的特賣會。

sentences.english: The department store sale will run from this Saturday through the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 百貨公司的特賣會從這週六延續到這個月底。

definition: Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east
Dounan or Tounan town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Yancheng district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
